JoblogWorkTime.DailyWorkTime: Morgen, dag, aften, nat, weekend, skiftende arbejdstider

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Join the KFC Denmark Family as a Restaurant Manager!

Are you a passionate leader with a love for fast - paced environments and a flair for the culinary world? KFC Denmark is looking for an outstanding Restaurant Manager to join our dynamic team!

Why KFC Denmark?

  • Global Brand, Local Impact: Be part of the iconic KFC brand, with the opportunity to make a real difference in the Danish community. We're known for our delicious food, and you'll play a key role in ensuring every customer has a memorable experience.
  • Growth Opportunities: We believe in nurturing talent from within. As a Restaurant Manager, you'll have access to extensive training programs and career - progression opportunities, both locally and internationally.
  • Fun and Supportive Team: At KFC Denmark, we're more than just colleagues; we're a family. Enjoy a positive work environment filled with energetic and dedicated team members.

Responsibilities

  • Leadership: Inspire and manage a high - performing team, fostering a culture of teamwork, customer service excellence, and continuous improvement.
  • Customer Experience: Ensure every guest receives top - notch service, addressing any concerns promptly to guarantee their satisfaction.
  • Operations: Oversee all aspects of restaurant operations, from food preparation and quality control to inventory management and cost - control measures.
  • Sales and Marketing: Implement local marketing initiatives to drive sales, increase brand awareness, and engage with the local community.

Requirements

  • Previous Management Experience: Preferably in the restaurant or fast - food industry, demonstrating strong leadership and operational skills.
  • Customer - Centric Mindset: A passion for providing excellent customer service and a deep understanding of customer needs.
  • Problem - Solving Skills: Ability to think on your feet and resolve any operational or customer - related issues efficiently.
  • Danish Language Proficiency: Speaking and understanding Danish is essential for effective communication with the team and local customers, but a willingness to learn the language if you don’t already speak it is also fine.

 What We Offer

  • Competitive Salary and Benefits: A rewarding compensation package that includes a competitive salary, performance - based bonuses, and comprehensive benefits.
  • Work - Life Balance: We understand the importance of a balanced life, offering flexible work arrangements where possible.

If you're ready to take your career to the next level and be a part of the KFC Denmark success story, apply now! Send your resume and a cover letter to job@KFC.dk with the headline “RGM KFC Amager”and let's start this exciting journey together.

details.FormattedPurpose:
